name: flywp-automation
description: e2e Automation coverage for FlyWP Project

scripts.test:shard1: npm run test:preShard && npx playwright test --project=shard1 && npm run test:postShard
scripts.test:shard2: npm run test:preShard && npx playwright test --project=shard2 && npm run test:postShard
scripts.test:shard3: npm run test:preShard && npx playwright test --project=shard3 && npm run test:postShard
scripts.generate-report: npm run merge-reports && npx playwright show-report ./playwright-report
scripts.test:sharded: npm run test:preShard && npx playwright test --project=shard1 && npx playwright test --project=shard2 && npx playwright test --project=shard3 && npm run test:postShard
